LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.label: shovel
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.description: One of the most versatile tools for a soldier, the entrenching tool is a simple but effective weapon. With a sturdy handle and a sharpened, heavy blade, it serves equally well for digging a trench or bludgeoning an enemy.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.label: baton
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.description: A sturdy, weighted club used for incapacitation and crowd control. Its dense construction delivers powerful blunt force trauma, favored by police and security forces for non-lethal (and sometimes lethal) engagements.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.label: combat knife
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.description: OA refined and deadly tool, the military combat knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for a sure grip and a sharp edge for cutting and thrusting, optimized for battlefield use.
